definition: lit. to descend to earth (of an immortal)/to be born
to drop/to fall/to come down/to descend

sentences.english: Jesus' first coming was as Savior to save those lost in sin.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌第一次降世，是做救主，要拯救陷在罪惡中的人。

sentences.english: To save us, God sent Jesus down to earth to become a man.
sentences.chinese: 神爲了拯救我們，差派耶穌道成肉身，降世爲人。

sentences.english: Ever since coming to the world, God's only begotten Son is both God and man forever.
sentences.chinese: 神的獨生子降世後就同時是神是人直到永遠。

sentences.english: Christ came not only to die for us but to reveal the Father.
sentences.chinese: 基督降世不單是爲我們受死，更是要將父神顯明出來。

sentences.english: We fast also to honor the Revelation of the Qur'an in this blessed month.
sentences.chinese: 我們齋戒同樣尊重在這個吉慶月份中古蘭經的降世。

sentences.english: Christ's coming to the world proved that God was not happy with man's unhappiness.
sentences.chinese: 基督降世表明神不喜悅人的痛苦。

sentences.english: And this presence will continue to manifest with the coming of Jesus Christ.
sentences.chinese: 神的同在將在耶穌基督的降世中繼續實現。

sentences.english: Wu came from the land of the special care and favor.
sentences.chinese: 武則天從太平降世就對她傾瀉了特別的關心和溺愛。

sentences.english: It was Jesus who came to mitigate this bitterness .
sentences.chinese: 耶穌降世就是要來減輕神的痛苦。

definition: to descend to the world (of immortals)
to be born/to come into being/to withdraw from worldly affairs
to be born/arrival of newborn/birth (of a savior or religious leader)
Holy Son/Jesus Christ/God the Son (in the Christian Trinity)
Holy Father/God the Father (in the Christian Trinity)
lit. to ascend to heaven/to die
to split heaven and earth apart (idiom); refers to the Pangu 盤古|盘古[Pan2 gu3] creation myth
